**Declaring Type:** [Tile](../)  
**Namespace:** [MonoGame.Aseprite.Tilemaps](../../)

Gets a value that indicates if this is an empty [Tile](../). 

```csharp
public bool IsEmpty { get; }
```

## Property Value

bool

## Remarks

Empty tiles have a [TilesetTileID](../Fields/TilesetTileID.md) equal to zero.
